registration_in_person_disclaimer:
(EVENT) Terms & Conditions

I Acknowledge the following: 

In-Person Ticket: I must show proof of full vaccination status prior to obtaining my badge. (EVENT) will ask to see proof of vaccination upon registration/check-in onsite at (VENUE). The name on your proof of vaccine card must match your valid government ID card (i.e., state driver’s license, passport, etc.) Proof of vaccination is acceptable in one of the following forms: 

  • Your original issued vaccine card, 
  • A photocopy of your original vaccine card,
  • A photo of your vaccine card on a smartphone or other electronic device, or,
  • A digital record that includes a scannable QR code that includes vaccine information.

Cookies

We use cookies to personalize content, to provide social media features and to analyze our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, solution providers, members and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services. You consent to our cookies if you continue to use this website.

Conference Participation Consent and Acknowledgement

By clicking “I agree” below, you hereby agree and consent to the Conference Participation terms set forth below. In consideration for my participation in the Infinity Festival Hollywood (known moving forward as the “Event”) –  November 2-4, 2021:I hereby authorize (EVENT) , and any (EVENT)  licensees and designees, to photograph me and prepare audio and video recordings of me, and my Presentation if applicable, at this Event (“Recordings”), and to reproduce and distribute the Recordings in whole or in part. I waive all rights of privacy or publicity associated therewith. 

(EVENT)  encourages participants to share their proposals, specifications and designs with the community. If I am presenting at this Event, I acknowledge that my Presentation and any ancillary materials I provide to (EVENT)  in connection with my Presentation, including without limitation any white paper, article, photograph, likeness, or professional biography (together, “Materials”) are made available under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License found here: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/, or any later version, and without limiting the foregoing, (EVENT)  may make the Materials available under such terms. (EVENT) may exercise its rights hereunder in all forms and media, whether now known or hereafter developed, throughout the world in perpetuity, royalty-free. My authorization and acknowledgement above is irrevocable and extends to (EVENT)  and its agents, successors, and assigns. I hereby waive any right to inspect or approve the Recordings. I acknowledge that (EVENT)  is under no obligation to use the Recordings, or Materials if applicable, in any manner.I hereby represent that I have the authority to grant the rights and licenses herein. And if I am presenting at this Event, I further represent and warrant that the Materials do not and will not violate the rights of any third party, including without limitation rights in intellectual property. I also represent that, to the extent the Materials include materials owned or created by any third-party, I have obtained permission for its use consistent with the foregoing. I will provide (EVENT)  evidence of such permission upon (EVENT)  request. Furthermore, as a presenter, I understand and agree to the following: 

  • that acceptance of my Presentation does not guarantee me a speaking engagement of any sort.
  • that my Presentation will be reviewed and prioritized by (EVENT)  and its executives and executive board.
  • that if I must cancel my presentation for any reason, I will inform (EVENT)  in writing at least 10 days in advance of the (EVENT) .
  • that (EVENT)   may accept or reject any presentation in its sole discretion at any time for any reason.

Virtual Event Attendance

As a virtual event attendee, I acknowledge that my profile and contact information, as well as my activity within the event, will be collected by the hosts of the event, and agree that my information and activity may be shared with sponsors, solution providers, members and analytics partners . I also agree that my attendee profile may be visible to others in the virtual event, including sponsors and other attendees.

GDPR

(EVENT)  will treat all information you provide in accordance with the (EVENT)  Privacy Policy posted at http://www.infinityfestival.com /privacy/. This includes cookies and any other information we may collect. 

Health and Safety

(EVENT)  continues to review current coronavirus safety guidance from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, as well as state and local officials. (EVENT) will follow applicable federal, state, and local laws and will adapt event plans accordingly. We will share these updates with our community through this site and www.infinityfestival.com.
